messages.title: My local issues are
messages.content: STOP The EU from closing our post offices. The land around here is too good to be covered in concrete and tarmac. We grow the best food and could save on imports.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Say YES to referendums on all major issues
Say NO to wasting £45 million a day in Brussels

issues.brexitEurope: Understanding the European Union is not an asset. It is an expensive milestone and costs the average family an extra £30 every week on groceries alone. You are subsidising French farmers.
issues.environment: The land around here is too good to be covered in concrete and tarmac. We grow the best food and could save on imports.

housing.content: The land around here is too good to be covered in concrete and tarmac.

leaflet.personalStatement: For over 30 years I have been campaigning for: Punishment to fit the crime. An Englishman's home is his castle.

images.caption: Richard Fairman - UKIP Candidate for South Holland and The Deepings
